steps.text: On the RIGHT side of the EVA Kit, locate and use the PANEL ACCESS KEY to unlock the PANEL ACCESS DOOR LOCKS.
steps.subtext: CAUTION: The keys are on a tension-spring cable.

steps.text: Carefully return keys to the side of the EVA kit.
Insert your fingers in the CENTER OPENING and secure the PANEL ACCESS DOOR in an OPEN position.
On your belt, use the BLUE CARABINEER to securely tether to the TETHER CABLE inside the STORAGE.
steps.subtext: CAUTION: Notice the TETHER CABLE is adjustable

steps.text: Locate the E-STOP button and gently press down to temporarily disable the alarm.
Locate the FUSIBLE DISCONNECT box and tether the BLUE CARABINEER to the TETHER CABLE.
Remove the BLUE CARABINEER from the FUSIBLE DISCONNECT box and transfer it to STORAGE.
Open the FUSIBLE DISCONNECT box and secure the lid in the open position.
steps.subtext: CAUTION: Pull the locking tab toward STORAGE with the index finger while lifting the cover with the thumb.

steps.text: Locate the BLACK DISCONNECT and tether it to the TETHER CABLE.
Remove the DISCONNECT and place it in STORAGE.
steps.subtext: CAUTION: Pull up with the index and middle fingers while pushing down on the FUSE ACCESS PANEL with the thumb.

steps.text: Tether the FUSE ACCESS PANEL to the TETHER CABLE.
Remove the FUSE ACCESS PANEL by pulling straight up.
Place the FUSE ACCESS PANEL into STORAGE.
Tether the ALARM FUSE to the TETHER CABLE.
In Storage, locate the BLUE FUSE PULLER.
Use the BLUE FUSE PULLER to remove ONLY the ALARM FUSE.
steps.subtext: CAUTION: Rock the ALARM FUSE with the FUSE PULLER when pulling up

steps.text: Return the ALARM FUSE and the FUSE PULLER to STORAGE.
In STORAGE, locate the FUSE ACCESS PANEL and reinstall it into the FUSIBLE DISCONNECT box.
Remove the FUSE ACCESS PANEL tether from the TETHER CABLE and stow inside.
steps.subtext: WARNING: All tethers are under spring tension and can retract quickly.

steps.text: In STORAGE, locate the DISCONNECT and reinstall it
steps.subtext: CAUTION: The DISCONNECT must read “ON” in the upper right corner to restore conductivity.

steps.text: Remove the DISCONNECT tether from the TETHER CABLE.
steps.subtext: WARNING: All tethers are under spring tension and can retract quickly.

steps.text: Close the FUSIBLE DISCONNECT box cover.
In STORAGE, use the BLUE CARABINEER to clip and lock the FUSIBLE DISCONNECT box cover.
Remove the BLUE CARABINEER’s tether from the TETHER CABLE.
steps.subtext: WARNING: All tethers are under spring tension and can retract quickly.
